languages.text: {n}Злоба тяжело искалечен, одна из рук висит на сухожилиях, почти оторванная. Но едкий сарказм никуда не делся из его голоса, как и кровожадный блеск из глаз.{/n} "Только стрельбу? Может, еще и рукопашные приемы? Выпусти меня... Помучиться. Одного на троих, на пятерых... без оружия. Пусть ребятишки позабавятся".

{n}Malice looks horribly maimed. One of his arms has almost been ripped off and now is hanging on by sinew alone. His acidic voice, however, is the same as before, and so is the bloodthirsty gleam in his eyes.{/n} "Just their aim? What about their close combat skills? Let me out... Make me suffer. Pit me against three of yours, five of yours... unarmed. Good entertainment for your people, is it not?"
languages.original_text: {n}Злоба тяжело искалечен, одна из рук висит на сухожилиях, почти оторванная. Но едкий сарказм никуда не делся из его голоса, как и кровожадный блеск из глаз.{/n} "Только стрельбу? Может, еще и рукопашные приемы? Выпусти меня... Помучиться. Одного на троих, на пятерых... без оружия. Пусть ребятишки позабавятся".

Pit me against three of yours, five of yours... unarmed. Good entertainment for your people, is it not?"
traits.speaker: Anger

traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}恶棍看起来残破不堪。他的一条胳膊几乎被扯掉了，只连着筋肉。不过，他恶毒的声音依然和之前一样，他的双眼中也闪烁着嗜血的光芒。{/n}“只练习射击就够了吗？那他们的近身战斗技术该怎么办？让我去吧……让我受苦吧，让我和你们的三个人、五个人对打吧……我什么武器都不拿。这对你的人来说会是个不错的娱乐活动，你说呢？”
languages.original_text: {n}Malice looks horribly maimed. One of his arms has almost been ripped off and now is hanging on by sinew alone. His acidic voice, however, is the same as before, and so is the bloodthirsty gleam in his eyes.{/n} "Just their aim? What about their close combat skills? Let me out... Make me suffer. Pit me against three of yours, five of yours... unarmed. Good entertainment for your people, is it not?"

traits.locale_text: {n}恶棍看起来残破不堪。他的一条胳膊几乎被扯掉了，只连着筋肉。不过，他恶毒的声音依然和之前一样，他的双眼中也闪烁着嗜血的光芒。{/n}“只练习射击就够了吗？那他们的近身战斗技术该怎么办？让我去吧……让我受苦吧，让我和你们的三个人、五个人对打吧……我什么武器都不拿。这对你的人来说会是个不错的娱乐活动，你说呢？”
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}マリスの身体はずたずたに負傷している。片腕はほとんど引きちぎられ、筋だけでぶら下がっている。しかし、彼の毒々しい声は以前と変わらず、血に飢えた目の輝きも鈍っていない。{/n}「射撃だけか？ついでに近接戦の練習台にも使ったらどうだ？俺を解放して…存分に苦しませてくれ。貴様らの仲間と武装していない状態で3対1…いや、5対1で戦ってもいい。俺が苦しんだ方が貴様らも見ごたえがあるだろう？」
languages.original_text: {n}Malice looks horribly maimed. One of his arms has almost been ripped off and now is hanging on by sinew alone. His acidic voice, however, is the same as before, and so is the bloodthirsty gleam in his eyes.{/n} "Just their aim? What about their close combat skills? Let me out... Make me suffer. Pit me against three of yours, five of yours... unarmed. Good entertainment for your people, is it not?"

traits.locale_text: {n}マリスの身体はずたずたに負傷している。片腕はほとんど引きちぎられ、筋だけでぶら下がっている。しかし、彼の毒々しい声は以前と変わらず、血に飢えた目の輝きも鈍っていない。{/n}「射撃だけか？ついでに近接戦の練習台にも使ったらどうだ？俺を解放して…存分に苦しませてくれ。貴様らの仲間と武装していない状態で3対1…いや、5対1で戦ってもいい。俺が苦しんだ方が貴様らも見ごたえがあるだろう？」
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}Malicia está terriblemente mutilado. Uno de sus brazos está prácticamente arrancado y solo cuelga de un tendón. Su voz ácida, sin embargo, sigue siendo la misma de antes, al igual que el brillo sanguinario de sus ojos.{/n} «¿Solo su puntería? ¿Qué hay de sus capacidades en el cuerpo a cuerpo? Déjame salir... haz que sufra. Enfréntame a tres de los tuyos, a cinco... sin armas. Será un buen entretenimiento para tu gente, ¿no?».
languages.original_text: {n}Malice looks horribly maimed. One of his arms has almost been ripped off and now is hanging on by sinew alone. His acidic voice, however, is the same as before, and so is the bloodthirsty gleam in his eyes.{/n} "Just their aim? What about their close combat skills? Let me out... Make me suffer. Pit me against three of yours, five of yours... unarmed. Good entertainment for your people, is it not?"

Déjame salir... haz que sufra. Enfréntame a tres de los tuyos, a cinco... sin armas. Será un buen entretenimiento para tu gente, ¿no?».

languages.original_text: {n}Malice looks horribly maimed. One of his arms has almost been ripped off and now is hanging on by sinew alone. His acidic voice, however, is the same as before, and so is the bloodthirsty gleam in his eyes.{/n} "Just their aim? What about their close combat skills? Let me out... Make me suffer. Pit me against three of yours, five of yours... unarmed. Good entertainment for your people, is it not?"

languages.text: {n}Démon est horriblement mutilé. L'un de ces bras, presque arraché, ne tient plus que par un tendon. En revanche, il semblerait que rien ne puisse altérer l'acidité de sa voix ou la lueur sanguinaire qui anime son regard.{/n} « Seulement à viser ? Pourquoi ne pas les entraîner au corps à corps ? Relâchez-moi... Faites-moi souffrir. Mettez-moi face à trois de vos hommes, ou même cinq... sans me donner d'arme. Ça, ça ferait un sacré divertissement pour vos troupes, non ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Malice looks horribly maimed. One of his arms has almost been ripped off and now is hanging on by sinew alone. His acidic voice, however, is the same as before, and so is the bloodthirsty gleam in his eyes.{/n} "Just their aim? What about their close combat skills? Let me out... Make me suffer. Pit me against three of yours, five of yours... unarmed. Good entertainment for your people, is it not?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Démon est horriblement mutilé. L'un de ces bras, presque arraché, ne tient plus que par un tendon. En revanche, il semblerait que rien ne puisse altérer l'acidité de sa voix ou la lueur sanguinaire qui anime son regard.{/n} « Seulement à viser ? Pourquoi ne pas les entraîner au corps à corps ? Relâchez-moi... Faites-moi souffrir. Mettez-moi face à trois de vos hommes, ou même cinq... sans me donner d'arme. Ça, ça ferait un sacré divertissement pour vos troupes, non ? »
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}Tücke sieht extrem mitgenommen aus. Einer seiner Arme wurde fast herausgerissen und hängt nur noch an ein paar Sehnen. Seine beißende Stimme jedoch hat sich nicht verändert, genauso wenig wie sein blutrünstiger Blick.{/n} "Nur zum Anvisieren? Und was ist mit ihren Nahkampffähigkeiten? Lasst mich raus ... lasst mich leiden. Ich trete gegen drei von Euch an, auch fünf ... unbewaffnet. Gute Unterhaltung für Eure Leute, oder nicht?"
languages.original_text: {n}Malice looks horribly maimed. One of his arms has almost been ripped off and now is hanging on by sinew alone. His acidic voice, however, is the same as before, and so is the bloodthirsty gleam in his eyes.{/n} "Just their aim? What about their close combat skills? Let me out... Make me suffer. Pit me against three of yours, five of yours... unarmed. Good entertainment for your people, is it not?"

languages.text: {n}Melanet, feci yaralı görünüyor. Kollarından biri neredeyse tamamen kopmuş, sadece kaslarla tutunur vaziyette sallanıyor. Asit gibi sesiyle gözlerindeki kana susamış ışıltı ise hâlâ yerli yerinde.{/n} "Sadece atış talimi mi? Yakın dövüş yetenekleri ne olacak? Sal beni. Bana acı çektir. Üçünüze, beşinize karşı savaşayım. Silahsız. Halkına iyi eğlence çıkar, yanlış mıyım?"
languages.original_text: {n}Malice looks horribly maimed. One of his arms has almost been ripped off and now is hanging on by sinew alone. His acidic voice, however, is the same as before, and so is the bloodthirsty gleam in his eyes.{/n} "Just their aim? What about their close combat skills? Let me out... Make me suffer. Pit me against three of yours, five of yours... unarmed. Good entertainment for your people, is it not?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Melanet feci şekilde sakat bırakılmış gibi görünüyor. Kollarından biri neredeyse tamamen kopmuş ve sadece kaslarla tutunur hâlde sallanıyor. Asit gibi sesi de, gözlerindeki kana susamış ışıltı da eskisinden farksız ama.{/n} "Sadece atış talimi mi? Yakın dövüş yetenekleri ne olacak? Sal beni. Bana acı çektir. Üçünüze, beşinize karşı savaşayım. Silahsız. Halkına iyi eğlence çıkar, yanlış mıyım?"
traits.speaker: Anger
